segments.text: I notice the kitchen's disarray right away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink overflowing with dirty water, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking everything, the cabinets look stained already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle, stepping in filth without knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably germy from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, hands in the cookie jar like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies falling, adding to the mess on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling in what might be wet spots soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, probably getting sticky fingers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole sneaky operation is just gross with the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks clean, but inside it's a soggy nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of slipping in that slimy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
